## Introduction 

## Former Vice President Joe Biden

```{r echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}

poll_data = 
read_csv("./data/cleaned_polls.csv") %>% 
  group_by(end_date, candidate_name) %>% 
  mutate(
    mean_pct = mean(pct)
  )

poll_data %>% 
  filter(candidate_name == "Joe Biden") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = end_date, y = mean_pct)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as.numeric(as.Date("2019-03-31")), linetype = 4) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = as.numeric(as.Date("2019-06-28")), linetype = 4) +
   geom_vline(xintercept = as.numeric(as.Date("2019-05-01")), linetype = 4) +
  labs(
    x = "Date",
    y = "Polling Percent",
    title = "Polling Performance from January 24th 2019 to November 3, 2019"
  )


```
